Hi,

I would like to display all hosts in my host report, but I am only lim=
ited to displaying 20 hosts.  I adjusted my global profiles sheet and incre=
ased the setting "live-host-report-size" thinking it would display more hos=
ts in my host report, but no luck... 

Any help would be greatly appreciate=
d.
Thanks,
- Doris

I am using Heritrix 2.0.2 and my global.sheet is as fol=
lows:
